welcomeMessage: Hi! You've just subscribed to updates from NotificationBot. Type `/unsubscribe` to unsubscribe.
unsubscribeMessage: You've been unsubscribed to updates from NotificationBot. Type `/subscribe` to re-subscribe.
resubscribeMessage: You've been re-subscribed to updates from NotificationBot. Type `/unsubscribe` to unsubscribe.
adminUnsubscribeMessage: You've been unsubscribed by the administrator.
oneWayMessage: You are not allowed to send messages back.
